Ski Solutions

The lack of responsiveness was negatively impacting on Ski Solutionâ€™s search engine rankings considerably. The solution to improve SEO and drive enquiries was to re-design and optimise the website experience from the bottom up.

Working from a mobile first, I redesigned the site to work across as many devices as possible, creating a CSS framework and icon font to maintain consistency with the colours, geometry and component styles.
